title: Cardano Community Campus
description: The current Cardano Community is not equipped to invite & welcome in the non-technological Change Agents that can really drive user adoption
solution: Online Community Platform all stakeholders can use, increasing engagement to drive outside proposers & their Networks by using Archetypes
experience: 11 Years offline/online Community Builder of Change Agents working together for common cause (artists, coders, makers, marketing, business)
